imdb.plot outline: Host Gail Kasper opens the program with a monologue, reflecting on the night's topic, and shares her own personal challenge with regard to the situation. She then shares some of the craziest stories, gaining feedback from her comedian friends, The Odd Squad. The Odd Squad is then joined by an expert who attempts to shed light on the situation, followed by Pass or Fail with Gail where each member of The Odd Squad grades a viewer's reaction to a similar situation, declaring a "Pass" or "Fail." Throughout the program, Gail Tweets with viewers.
imdb.title: Raw Reality with Gail Kasper
akas: Raw Reality with Gail Kasper (United States)
plot: Host Gail Kasper opens the program with a monologue, reflecting on the night's topic, and shares her own personal challenge with regard to the situation. She then shares some of the craziest stories, gaining feedback from her comedian friends, The Odd Squad. The Odd Squad is then joined by an expert who attempts to shed light on the situation, followed by Pass or Fail with Gail where each member of The Odd Squad grades a viewer's reaction to a similar situation, declaring a "Pass" or "Fail." Throughout the program, Gail Tweets with viewers.::Hound Dog Productions

Host Gail Kasper is joined by the Odd Squad, an odd team of two comedians and an expert. Together, they make fun of life... and relate to the every day viewer on today's hottest issues, inspiring on the lighter side through humorous discussion.::Hound Dog Productions
